physical_appearance:This lamp is composed of three circular ceramic plates
 attached together by chains. Each plate is decorated with blue glaze
 with a scrolling foliage pattern. The top plate has a large hook in the middle
 while the other two plates have four smaller pegs attached on its body. The plates have slightly scallop-shaped edges.

metadata.physical_appearance: This lamp is composed of three circular ceramic plates, attached together by chains. Each plate is decorated with blue glaze, with a scrolling foliage pattern. The top plate has a large hook in the middle, while the other two plates have four smaller pegs attached on its body. The plates have slightly scallop-shaped edges.
